text:
run the target "-link-to-parent" in http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/ant/core/trunk/src/tests/antunit/core/dirscanner-symlinks-test.xml

<delete dir="${input}"/>

fails after that.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
I don't really want to duplicate directoryscanner's code in delete.

Document the shortcomings of <delete dir="..."/> and be happy.
